entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Regression] [Android] [Maps] Map locks up after adding ~200-300 locations to Polyline #20532
  • "Codesign exited with code 1" issue when try to build an iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac, Rider and VS Code #20530
  • MAUI Apps cannot be restored in locked mode. #20522
  • ListView in iOS Displays Incorrect Text After Scrolling #20519
    Backlog
  • Shadow not rendering properly[Android] #20518
    Backlog
  • [OneLoc] Localization of templates and resources files #20515
    .NET 9 Planning
  • WinUI crash at shell navigation #20514
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.FileImageSourceService: Warning: Unable to load image file #20513

Closed

  • In MAUI TitleView on non-modal pages, a horizontally centered control is not centered on the screen #20323
  • Setter showing a Build Error when using XAML OnPlatform Markup Extension #12064
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Regression] .NET 8 FlyoutPage Toolbar Missing #20512
  • WebRTC (navigator.mediaDevices) is not available on MacCatalyst but works with iOS #20511
  • [iOS] OrientationStateTrigger does not detect orientation state changes on iPad (works on iPhone) #20491
  • Location constructor silently cuts off latitude and longitude values #19389
    Backlog
  • [Android] PhoneDialer does not paste entire number into dialer #20497
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Set Focus to a DatePicker scroll the view to bottom on iOS #20494
  • Getting AccessViolationException while adding custom resource dictionary in App.Xaml file in Release builds #19535
  • XAML can't find outer converter and fails to build #16468
    Backlog
  • ListView Control Behaviour Broken #20416
  • [UITests] Add features for running tests in better isolation and for handling Multiple Test Cases #16675
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable now passing tests and add some TableView categories #20531
  • Bump to latest VisualTestUtils #20525
  • Restructured CodeBehindGenerator pipeline #20524

Merged

  • [main] Update with release/8.0.1xx sr2 #20520
  • Remove non-supported tasks / actions in preparation for migration off of FabricBot #20527
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale
  • Optimize GetVisualTreeElementsWindowsInternal #19984
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, stale
  • Removes dead code from type conversion #19436
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Add '#' to trigger UrlEncoding on Android PhoneDialer #20498
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS][tests] NativeAOT: Do not treat warnings as errors in integration tests #20471
  • [X] Fix XamlCompilation of RD subclasses #20463
  • Remove cleanup for CI Builds #20395
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Revert "Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #20509
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏

Updated

  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, stale
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR3
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • Remove allocation from Color.TryParse #20446
  • Fix connectivity broadcast receiver never triggered on android 14.0/34+ #19968
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • Add support for relative binding sources to TypedBinding #20415
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException for Span GridItemsLayout fix #20492
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [core] introduce `WeakEventHandler<T>`, internal for now #20440
    area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    platform/android 🤖, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, control-editor
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • [Trimming] Fix remaining trimming warnings related to XAML parsing #20474
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
    area/Xaml </>
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, stale, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-frame
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [Trimming] Add new API to create TypedBindings from expression #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Android] Pickers' reopening in collections #20437
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
